contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No. 1434-2017 to designate 585 Bloor Street West (Wrigley Building) (Trinity-Spadina, Ward 19) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: TE23.16 - Alterations and Removal of a Heritage Property, Intention to Designate under the Ontario Heritage Act and Authority to Enter into Heritage Easement Agreements - 738-746 Bathurst Street, 585 Bloor Street West and 581-597 and 588-606 and 610 Markham Street
By-law 1434-2017 - To designate the property at 585 Bloor Street West (Wrigley Building) as being of cultural heritage value or interest

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act  R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and  585 BLOOR STREET WEST (WRIGLEY BUILDING)  City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing of By-law 1434-2017 - 585 Bloor Street West (Wrigley Building)
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
